name: Morgrem
description: When it gets down on all fours as if to beg for forgiveness, it’s trying to lure opponents in so that it can stab them with its spear-like hair.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's non-damaging moves have their priority increased by one stage.
abilities.description: Gives priority to a status move.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers.  In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check the foe’s held item.

abilities.name: Pickpocket
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, if it does not have a held item, it steals the attacker's held item.  This Pokémon cannot steal upon being knocked out.  It can steal if the attacker has a substitute, but cannot steal when its own Substitute is hit.  If a move hits multiple times, only the last hit triggers this ability.  If this Pokémon is wild, it cannot steal from a trained Pokémon.
abilities.description: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.
